ratings_overview.overall_sentiment: Highly positive - customers praise atmosphere, staff, and rock music ambiance

customer_reviews.quote: Great pub for anyone who likes rock and a rough style... still a really cozy corner... highly recommended.
Super Kneipe, klasse Wirt tolle Gäste
customer_reviews.translation: Super pub, great host, great guests

customer_reviews.quote: immer wieder gute Hardrock-Musik und super nette Leute, man kommt sofort ins Gespräch
customer_reviews.translation: always good hard rock music and super nice people, you get into conversation immediately

customer_reviews.quote: Gutes Essen ... breites Auswahl, gute Sitze, nettes Personal und gute Musik
customer_reviews.translation: Good food... wide selection, good seats, nice staff and good music

customer_reviews.quote: A bike pub, but yet you can also show up here in a fine suit and evening dress without being looked at strangely. And even if it's just a pub, you don't have the usual drinking lots of people here, but mostly really nice people

beer.description: Wide selection of beer varieties (Große Auswahl an Biersorten)
